name: jamos_dd13
description:
okay to exit press ctrl-left or right until you are at main terminal, then type /quit and hit enter

there is 32 and 64bit but 64bit has messed up sound

More

Main page.

List of games
  1. JamOS 0.1 - submitted AGDG wj 2016: I never got this into a proper gameplay state. This represents generation 1 of JamOS engine codebase.
  2. This one - submitted AGDG DD13 Feb 2017: I never got this into a proper gameplay state either. But now it is like an RTS rather than a clicker. It even has unit selection, movement, and health bar. Nothing else though no gameplay no map scrolling no shooting, and the turret angle aiming is messed up. This represents generation 2 of JamOS engine codebase, it is more cohesive.
